category.name: Expresso
category.special_instructions: Espresso: the perfect blend of intensity and elegance in every sip.

menu_items.name: Americano
menu_items.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

menu_items.name: Cappuccino
menu_items.description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam. An alchemy of barista artistry and craft.

menu_items.name: Latte
menu_items.description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk-forward warm-up.

menu_items.name: Caffè Misto
menu_items.description: A one-to-one combination of fresh-brewed coffee and steamed milk add up to one distinctly delicious coffee drink remarkably mixed.

menu_items.name: Caramel Macchiato
menu_items.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup marked with espresso and topped with a caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

menu_items.name: Caffè Mocha
menu_items.description: Our rich, full-bodied espresso combined with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, then topped with sweetened whipped cream. The classic coffee drink that always sweetly satisfies.

menu_items.name: Honey Almondmilk Flat White
menu_items.description: This flat white intentionally pairs almondmilk and Starbucks® Blonde Espresso Roast with a hint of honey, making a perfect amount of creamy, nutty sweetness.

menu_items.name: Espresso
menu_items.description: Our smooth signature Espresso Roast with rich flavor and caramelly sweetness is at the very heart of everything we do.
